mapper.update: update sf_user_bill set com_user_id = #{comUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_man = #{createMan,jdbcType=BIGINT}, counting_date = #{countingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bill_amount = #{billAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, count_amount = #{countAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, return_amount = #{returnAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, source_start_time = #{sourceStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, source_end_time = #{sourceEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, com_user_id, create_time, create_man, counting_date, bill_amount, count_amount, return_amount, source_start_time, source_end_time, status, remark from sf_user_bill where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
